    Creates a curve entity from a mesh entity.
    CurveEntity3
    CurveEntity3.reframe()
    Centers and rescales all curves in the curve entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions, subtracting the center point, and scaling by the maximum dimension.
    CurveEntity3

    Relocates a knot within the curve to a point in global space.
